item.title: An Introduction to Outside-In Development
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
An Introduction to Outside-in Development
by HAROLD GIMENEZ on OCTOBER 5, 2010

Check it out at http://rubylearning.com/blog/2010/10/05/outside-in-development/

It isn't theory and praises, it is chock full of good stuff.  Recommended reading!
